channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive: Laurel raises $100 million Series C to map where the time goes
item.description: Laurel has raised a $100 million Series C led by IVP, Fortune has exclusively learned. The deal values the startup at $510 million.

item.description: By continuing to face this crisis with appeals to higher courts, the president is bringing a knife to a gun fight. He should instead bring a howitzer.

item.title: Employee confidence amongst entry-level workers just hit an all-time low
item.description: Entry-level workers are feeling the brunt of economic uncertainty and it’s leading to an overall decline in job confidence.

item.title: Think We’ve Seen the Last +1,000-BPS High Yield Spread? Think Again
item.description: Think +1,000-bps high yield spreads are history? Marty Fridson shows why they could still hit that mark in the next recession.
